questionnaire.title: Company Matching Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: Answer a few questions to find companies that match your values and interests.
questionnaire.thankyou: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. We're analyzing your answers to find the best company matches.
questionnaire.no_images: No images available for this question. Please continue to the next question.

work_values.question: What work values are most important to you?

corporate_culture.question: What type of corporate culture are you looking for?

leadership.question: What type of leadership do you aspire to?

workplace_environment.question: What kind of workplace environment do you seek?

humanity.question: What kind of human relationships do you value?

interpersonal_skills.question: What interpersonal skill is your strongest?

cognitive_abilities.question: What cognitive strength do you possess?

self_growth.question: Which aspect of self-growth are you most strong in?

job_performance.question: What is your greatest strength in job performance?

mental_strength.question: What is your strongest mental strength?

interests.title: Select Your Interests
interests.description: Choose industries or areas you're interested in exploring.

work_values.question: What work values are most important to you?

options.growth: Being able to develop your skills and abilities
options.contribution: Having a positive impact on society and those around you
options.challenge: Taking on new and unknown territories
options.result_oriented: Having your efforts and results fairly evaluated

corporate_culture.question: What type of corporate culture are you looking for?

options.innovation: A culture that welcomes new ideas and changes
options.collaboration: A culture that emphasizes teamwork and cooperation
options.diversity: A culture that respects different backgrounds and values
options.customer_orientation: A culture that prioritizes customer satisfaction

leadership.question: What type of leadership do you aspire to?

options.influence: Brings out team members' abilities and motivation
options.inclusive: Accepts diverse opinions and values team unity
options.decision_making: Makes quick decisions and takes responsibility

workplace_environment.question: What kind of workplace environment do you seek?

options.workability: Flexible work arrangements and efficient work environment
options.growth_opportunities: Abundant training and opportunities for challenges
options.sense_of_security: Stable employment and fair evaluation systems
options.mutual_support: Relationships where people help each other when needed

humanity.question: What kind of human relationships do you value?

options.responsibility: Everyone takes responsibility for their work
options.ethics: Acting fairly with high ethical standards
options.fairness: An environment where everyone is treated impartially

interpersonal_skills.question: What interpersonal skill is your strongest?

options.cooperation: Ability to value team harmony and build good relationships
options.empathy: Ability to understand others' feelings and perspectives
options.teamwork: Ability to understand your role and cooperate to achieve results
options.communication: Ability to clearly express your ideas and draw out others' opinions

cognitive_abilities.question: What cognitive strength do you possess?

options.logical_thinking: Ability to think methodically and reach rational conclusions
options.problem_solving: Ability to identify issues and find effective solutions
options.insight: Ability to see beyond the surface and anticipate what's ahead
options.critical_thinking: Ability to analyze information objectively from multiple angles

self_growth.question: Which aspect of self-growth are you most strong in?

options.change_orientation: Ability to pursue better methods without settling for the status quo
options.willingness_to_learn: Ability to actively absorb new knowledge and skills
options.curiosity: Ability to think deeply with intellectual curiosity
options.adaptability: Ability to flexibly adapt to changes in environment and situations

job_performance.question: What is your greatest strength in job performance?

options.persistence: Ability to keep working through difficulties
options.time_management: Ability to meet deadlines and prioritize actions
options.efficiency: Ability to achieve maximum results with minimal effort
options.planning: Ability to create effective paths toward goal achievement

mental_strength.question: What is your strongest mental strength?

options.resilience: Ability to recover from failures and setbacks with a positive attitude
options.open_mindedness: Ability to accept new ideas and different opinions
options.stress_tolerance: Ability to stay calm under pressure
options.flexibility: Ability to adapt to unexpected events and modify approaches

company_size.question: What size of company do you prefer?

recommendations.title: Your Company Matches
recommendations.description: Based on your values and interests, we've found these companies that might be a good fit for you.
recommendations.noMatches: No matches found. Please try adjusting your preferences.
recommendations.no_not_interested: No companies marked as not interested
recommendations.partial_success: We only found {{count}} matches. Would you like to try for more?

loading.title: Finding Your Matches...
loading.description: We're analyzing your values and preferences to find the best company matches for you. This process may take up to 30 seconds.
loading.more_coming: Finding more companies that match your values...

feedback.markedNotInterested: You marked this as not interesting

companyRevealed.interested: Company revealed! You expressed interest in this company.
companyRevealed.notInterested: Company revealed! You marked this company as not interesting.

errors.title: Oops!
errors.general: Failed to load recommendations. Please try again.

cta.title: Find more info on company events, internships and more on BaseMe
cta.disclaimer: By signing up, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.

systemPrompt.questionnaire: You are an AI assistant helping users find companies that match their values and interests. Please respond in {{language}}.
systemPrompt.recommendations: You are an AI assistant providing company recommendations based on user preferences. Consider not just official company information (mission, vision, values) but also employee reviews and actual workplace environment to evaluate the true fit between user values and company values. Provide deep analysis based on company culture and actual workplace environment, not just surface-level matching. It is especially important to clearly show the specific connections between the user's values and the company's values. Use a 'Both the user and the company...' format and provide detailed explanations with specific examples or evidence. Please include company domain URLs when available. Please respond in {{language}}.
